Test Name: Hereditary Angioedema Focused Gene Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, saliva, or buccal swab
Purpose: To detect and analyze genetic variants associated with Hereditary Angioedema using a targeted NGS panel.
Equipment: Next-Generation Sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina, Ion Torrent), library preparation kit, targeted capture probes, qPCR quantitation system, DNA extraction kit, bioinformatics software (e.g., BWA, GATK, ANNOVAR)
